generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb, where pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and awnings is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the roadside and in front of the building.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the foreground and along the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Several people are visible standing and walking on the sidewalk near the building.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sidewalk.
- truck: An orange emergency vehicle (likely a fire department truck) is visible on the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
